name: Creative Servant
description: Storytellers Carrie Bergan and Sarah Slater introduce us to Felisha, who grew up in a family that was often full of fear, sadness and brokenness. But school changed the trajectory of her life. At a government school she met a missionary and was saved. Now she is a university student who wants to use her artwork to remind others of God's omnipresence and to reveal His beauty.
author: Carrie Bergan & Sarah Slater
